title: Termux Integration
description: Create core/termux/: TermuxBridge, TermuxResultService, TermuxConstants for IPC with Termux app
close_reason: Implemented network layer and termux integration

title: Markdown Rendering
description: Add compose-markdown integration for rendering markdown in chat messages
close_reason: Integrated compose-markdown MarkdownText in ChatMessage TextPart for assistant message rendering

title: Navigation Setup
description: Create ui/navigation/: Screen routes, NavGraph composable
close_reason: Created Screen routes and NavGraph with animations

title: Dependency Injection Modules
description: Create di/: AppModule, NetworkModule, DatabaseModule for Hilt DI
close_reason: Created DI modules, datastore, database entities and DAOs

title: Network Layer - API & SSE
description: Create core/network/: OpenCodeApi (Retrofit), OpenCodeEventSource (SSE), ApiResult, ConnectionState
close_reason: Implemented network layer and termux integration

title: SessionListScreen
description: List sessions, create new, delete, show status
close_reason: Created SessionListScreen with session cards, create/delete dialogs and ViewModel

title: ChatScreen - Core Chat UI
description: Chat interface with message streaming, tool cards, permission dialogs, markdown rendering
close_reason: Created ChatScreen, ChatViewModel, and chat components (ChatInputBar, ChatMessage, PermissionDialog)

title: Domain Models
description: Create domain/model/: Session, Message, Part, ToolState, Event, Permission, ServerConfig
close_reason: Created all domain models: Session, Message, Part, ToolState, Event, Permission, ServerConfig, FileNode, SearchResult

title: Repository Layer
description: Implement SessionRepository, MessageRepository, FileRepository interfaces and implementations
close_reason: Created SessionRepositoryImpl, MessageRepositoryImpl, FileRepositoryImpl, EventRepositoryImpl with full domain/entity mapping and RepositoryModule DI bindings

title: Unit Tests
description: Add unit tests for ViewModels and Repositories
close_reason: Added unit tests for SessionRepositoryImpl (10 tests), MessageRepositoryImpl (7 tests), and ChatViewModel (12 tests) - all 29 tests passing

title: Offline Caching
description: Sync API data with Room database for offline support
close_reason: Offline caching already implemented in repository layer - SessionRepositoryImpl and MessageRepositoryImpl cache API data to Room database automatically

title: Code Syntax Highlighting
description: Integrate syntax highlighting for code blocks in chat messages
close_reason: Added syntaxHighlightColor and linkColor parameters to MarkdownText in ChatMessage for code block styling

title: Build & verify compilation
description: Run gradlew assembleDebug to verify the project compiles

title: ServerScreen - Connection UI
description: Server connection screen: Local (Termux) or Remote mode, connection status
close_reason: Created ServerScreen with local/remote modes and ServerViewModel

title: Pocket Code Android App
description: Native Android client for OpenCode AI agent with Termux integration
